alert.note: Alert for Cameron Island; Coastal Cameron; Coastal Kenedy; Coastal Willacy; Inland Cameron; Inland Kenedy; Inland Willacy; Willacy Island (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 10:27PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Kenedy, Cameron and Willacy Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 1026 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near San Perlita to Rio Hondo High School to Landrum. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Harlingen, San Benito, Raymondville, La Feria, Los Fresnos, Santa Rosa, South Padre Island, Lyford, Rancho Viejo and Rio Hondo. This includes the following highways... Interstate Highway 69 E between mile markers 1 and 51. US Highway 77 between mile markers 752 and 762. US Highway 281 between mile markers 816 and 838. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
